pages.text: On your way to the end you found a huge underground structure that seemed like a fortress of a civilization that lived far before you.$(br2)Although they seemed to have technology that allowed them to open a portal to another world, they definitely should have done something about their vermin problem.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Gets rid of Silverfish when breaking Infested Blocks, dropping double XP.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Resonance.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Pest Control by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.
